DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, single-arm study to assess the reduction of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) by REGN1500 in patients with homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HoFH).
DOC.brief_title: Study of REGN1500 in Patients With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia (HoFH)
